ai.summary: A very short, easy diversion off the Capital Ring to bypass a flooded section. This 0.1 km route provides a quick, accessible way to enjoy local greenspace with minimal time commitment.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat urban-to-suburban footpaths with a short stretch along a waterway. Footing is typically firm but can be muddy after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Check local flood warnings before you go. The diversion may be closed during high water. Wear sturdy footwear, stay on marked paths, and be mindful of cyclists on shared routes. Have a plan to turn back if weather worsens.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with most pleasant conditions in spring and autumn

seo.title: Capital Ring Flood Diversion – 0.1 km Easy Walk (UK)
seo.meta_description: A short, easy diversion of the Capital Ring to bypass flooding. 0.1 km route with safety tips and gear for a quick UK outdoor walk.
seo.h1: Capital Ring Flood Diversion – 0.1 km Easy Walk
